io.scanbot.sdk.contourdetector

Class ContourDetectorFrameHandler

  • io.scanbot.sdk.contourdetector.ContourDetectorFrameHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FrameHandler

    public class ContourDetectorFrameHandler
implements FrameHandler

    Performs contour detection on camera preview frames. Outputs results via interface ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler (.addResultHandler).

    Preview frame considered intercepted if at least one interface ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler returns true from ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler.handle (FrameHandlerResult)}

    See Also:
    interface ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler, .addResultHandler, interface ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler, ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler.handle, interface PreviewBuffer

                                   android.content.Context context,
                                   @NotNull
                                   ContourDetector contourDetector)

        Performs contour detection on camera preview frames. Outputs results via interface ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler (.addResultHandler).

        Preview frame considered intercepted if at least one interface ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler returns true from ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler.handle (FrameHandlerResult)}

        See Also:
        interface ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler, .addResultHandler, interface ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler, ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler.handle, interface PreviewBuffer

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if contour detection is enabled. false if contour detection is disabled, i.e. incoming frames are skipped.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean p)

      • handleFrame

        @Synchronized
public boolean handleFrame(@NotNull
                                         io.scanbot.sdk.camera.FrameHandler.Frame previewFrame)

        Invoked for every new camera preview frame

        Parameters:
        previewFrame - captured preview frame data
        Returns:
        true if frame should be considered as "intercepted", i.e. no further processing should be performed on it. false to allow other frame handlers to process this frame.

      • addResultHandler

        public void addResultHandler(@NotNull
                             io.scanbot.sdk.contourdetector.ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler handler)

        Registers result handler which will be notified about contour detection results.

        Results are coming on the worker thread. Don't forget to move execution to main thread before updating UI.

        Parameters:
        handler - handler to register. Must not be null. If handler was alreadyregistered, nothing happens.

      • removeResultHandler

        public void removeResultHandler(@NotNull
                                io.scanbot.sdk.contourdetector.ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler handler)

        Unregisters handler.

        Parameters:
        handler - handler to unregister. If it was not registered before, nothing happens.

      • clearResultHandlers

        public void clearResultHandlers()

        Unregisters all handlers.

      • setAcceptedAngleScore

        public void setAcceptedAngleScore(double acceptedAngleScore)

        The minimum score in percent (0 - 100) of the perspective distortion to accept a detected document. Default is 75.0. Set lower values to accept more perspective distortion.

        Warning: Lower values result in more blurred document images.

        Parameters:
        acceptedAngleScore -

      • setAcceptedSizeScore

        public void setAcceptedSizeScore(double acceptedSizeScore)

        The minimum size in percent (0 - 100) of the screen size to accept a detected document. It is sufficient that height or width match the score. Default is 80.0.

        Warning: Lower values result in low resolution document images.

        Parameters:
        acceptedSizeScore -

      • setRequiredAspectRatios

        public void setRequiredAspectRatios(@Nullable
                                    java.util.List<io.scanbot.sdk.core.contourdetector.PageAspectRatio> requiredPageAspectRatios)

        Set required class PageAspectRatios.

        Parameters:
        requiredPageAspectRatios -
        See Also:
        class PageAspectRatio

        protected boolean notifyHandlers(@NotNull
                                 FrameHandlerResult<io.scanbot.sdk.contourdetector.ContourDetectorFrameHandler.DetectedFrame,io.scanbot.sdk.SdkLicenseError> result)

      • <no name provided>

        public void <no name provided>()

        Continuously notified about contour detection results.

      • attach

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static ContourDetectorFrameHandler attach(@NotNull
                                                                      IScanbotCameraView cameraView,
                                                                      @NotNull
                                                                      ContourDetector detector)

        Convenience method for creating new class ContourDetectorFrameHandler and adding it as interface FrameHandler to given camera view.

        Parameters:
        cameraView - camera view to which new contour detector will be attached
        detector - contour detector instance
        Returns:
        new class ContourDetectorFrameHandler
